At<S>1722</S> the same<S>1565</S> time<S>5610</S> came<S>4334</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> unto Jesus<S>2424</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Who<S>5101</S> <S>686</S> is<S>2076</S> the greatest<S>3187</S> in<S>1722</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>?
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> called<S>4341</S> a little child<S>3813</S> unto him<S>4341</S>, and set<S>2476</S> him<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> the midst<S>3319</S> of them<S>846</S>,
And<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Except<S>3362</S> ye be converted<S>4762</S>, and<S>2532</S> become<S>1096</S> as<S>5613</S> little children<S>3813</S>, ye shall<S>1525</S> not<S>3364</S> enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>.
Whosoever<S>3748</S> therefore<S>3767</S> shall humble<S>5013</S> himself<S>1438</S> as<S>5613</S> this<S>5124</S> little child<S>3813</S>, the same<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> greatest<S>3187</S> in<S>1722</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>.
And<S>2532</S> whoso<S>3739</S> <S>1437</S> shall receive<S>1209</S> one<S>1520</S> such<S>5108</S> little child<S>3813</S> in<S>1909</S> my<S>3450</S> name<S>3686</S> receiveth<S>1209</S> me<S>1691</S>.
But<S>1161</S> whoso<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall offend<S>4624</S> one<S>1520</S> of these<S>5130</S> little ones<S>3398</S> which<S>3588</S> believe<S>4100</S> in<S>1519</S> me<S>1691</S>, it were better<S>4851</S> for him<S>846</S> that<S>2443</S> a millstone<S>3458</S> <S>3684</S> were hanged<S>2910</S> about<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> neck<S>5137</S>, and<S>2532</S> that he were drowned<S>2670</S> in<S>1722</S> the depth<S>3989</S> of the sea<S>2281</S>.
Woe<S>3759</S> unto the world<S>2889</S> because of<S>575</S> offences<S>4625</S>! for<S>1063</S> it must needs<S>318</S> be<S>2076</S> that offences<S>4625</S> come<S>2064</S>; but<S>4133</S> woe<S>3759</S> to that man<S>444</S> by<S>1565</S> whom<S>1223</S> <S>3739</S> the offence<S>4625</S> cometh<S>2064</S>!
Wherefore<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> thy<S>4675</S> hand<S>5495</S> or<S>2228</S> thy<S>4675</S> foot<S>4228</S> offend thee<S>4624</S>, cut<S>1581</S> them<S>846</S> off<S>1581</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast<S>906</S> them from<S>575</S> thee<S>4571</S> <S>4675</S>: it is<S>2076</S> better<S>2570</S> for thee<S>4671</S> to enter into<S>1525</S> <S>1519</S> life<S>2222</S> halt<S>5560</S> or<S>2228</S> maimed<S>2948</S>, rather than<S>2228</S> having<S>2192</S> two<S>1417</S> hands<S>5495</S> or<S>2228</S> two<S>1417</S> feet<S>4228</S> to be cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> everlasting<S>166</S> fire<S>4442</S>.
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1487</S> thine<S>4675</S> eye<S>3788</S> offend<S>4624</S> thee<S>4571</S>, pluck<S>1807</S> it<S>846</S> out<S>1807</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast<S>906</S> it from<S>575</S> thee<S>4675</S>: it is<S>2076</S> better<S>2570</S> for thee<S>4671</S> to enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> life<S>2222</S> with one eye<S>3442</S>, rather than<S>2228</S> having<S>2192</S> two<S>1417</S> eyes<S>3788</S> to be cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> hell<S>1067</S> fire<S>4442</S>.
Take heed<S>3708</S> that ye despise<S>2706</S> not<S>3361</S> one<S>1520</S> of these<S>5130</S> little ones<S>3398</S>; for<S>1063</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S> their<S>846</S> angels<S>32</S> do always<S>1223</S> <S>3956</S> behold<S>991</S> the face<S>4383</S> of my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> is come<S>2064</S> to save<S>4982</S> that which<S>3588</S> was lost<S>622</S>.
How<S>5101</S> think<S>1380</S> ye<S>5213</S>? if<S>1437</S> <S>5100</S> a man<S>444</S> have<S>1096</S> an hundred<S>1540</S> sheep<S>4263</S>, and<S>2532</S> one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> them<S>846</S> be gone astray<S>4105</S>, doth he<S>863</S> not<S>3780</S> leave<S>863</S> the ninety and nine<S>1768</S>, and goeth<S>4198</S> into<S>1909</S> the mountains<S>3735</S>, and seeketh<S>2212</S> that which<S>3588</S> is gone astray<S>4105</S>?
And<S>2532</S> if so<S>1437</S> be<S>1096</S> that he find<S>2147</S> it<S>846</S>, verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S> <S>3754</S>, he rejoiceth<S>5463</S> more<S>3123</S> of<S>1909</S> that<S>846</S> sheep, than<S>2228</S> of<S>1909</S> the ninety and nine<S>1768</S> which<S>3588</S> went<S>4105</S> not<S>3361</S> astray<S>4105</S>.
Even so<S>3779</S> it is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> the will<S>2307</S> of<S>1715</S> your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, that<S>2443</S> one<S>1520</S> of these<S>5130</S> little ones<S>3398</S> should perish<S>622</S>.
Moreover<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> thy<S>4675</S> brother<S>80</S> shall trespass<S>264</S> against<S>1519</S> thee<S>4571</S>, go<S>5217</S> and<S>2532</S> tell<S>1651</S> him<S>846</S> his fault<S>1651</S> between<S>3342</S> thee<S>4675</S> and<S>2532</S> him<S>846</S> alone<S>3441</S>: if<S>1437</S> he shall hear<S>191</S> thee<S>4675</S>, thou hast gained<S>2770</S> thy<S>4675</S> brother<S>80</S>.
But<S>1161</S> if<S>3362</S> he will<S>191</S> not<S>3362</S> hear<S>191</S> thee, then take<S>3880</S> with<S>3326</S> thee<S>4675</S> one<S>1520</S> or<S>2228</S> two<S>1417</S> more<S>2089</S>, that<S>2443</S> in<S>1909</S> the mouth<S>4750</S> of two<S>1417</S> or<S>2228</S> three<S>5140</S> witnesses<S>3144</S> every<S>3956</S> word<S>4487</S> may be established<S>2476</S>.
And<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> he shall neglect to hear<S>3878</S> them<S>846</S>, tell<S>2036</S> it unto the church<S>1577</S>: but<S>1161</S> <S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> he neglect to hear<S>3878</S> the church<S>1577</S>, let him be<S>2077</S> unto thee<S>4671</S> as<S>5618</S> an heathen man<S>1482</S> and<S>2532</S> a publican<S>5057</S>.
Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Whatsoever<S>3745</S> <S>1437</S> ye shall bind<S>1210</S> on<S>1909</S> earth<S>1093</S> shall be<S>2071</S> bound<S>1210</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>: and<S>2532</S> whatsoever<S>3745</S> <S>1437</S> ye shall loose<S>3089</S> on<S>1909</S> earth<S>1093</S> shall be<S>2071</S> loosed<S>3089</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
Again<S>3825</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> if<S>1437</S> two<S>1417</S> of you<S>5216</S> shall agree<S>4856</S> on<S>1909</S> earth<S>1093</S> as touching<S>4012</S> any<S>3956</S> thing<S>4229</S> that<S>3739</S> <S>1437</S> they shall ask<S>154</S>, it shall be done<S>1096</S> for them<S>846</S> of<S>3844</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
For<S>1063</S> where<S>3757</S> two<S>1417</S> or<S>2228</S> three<S>5140</S> are<S>1526</S> gathered together<S>4863</S> in<S>1519</S> my<S>1699</S> name<S>3686</S>, there<S>1563</S> am I<S>1510</S> in<S>1722</S> the midst<S>3319</S> of them<S>846</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> came<S>4334</S> Peter<S>4074</S> to him<S>846</S>, and said<S>2036</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, how oft<S>4212</S> shall my<S>3450</S> brother<S>80</S> sin<S>264</S> against<S>1519</S> me<S>1691</S>, and<S>2532</S> I forgive<S>863</S> him<S>846</S>? till<S>2193</S> seven times<S>2034</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, I say<S>3004</S> not<S>3756</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, Until<S>2193</S> seven times<S>2034</S>: but<S>235</S>, Until<S>2193</S> seventy times<S>1441</S> seven<S>2033</S>.
Therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> is the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> likened<S>3666</S> unto a certain<S>444</S> king<S>935</S>, which<S>3739</S> would<S>2309</S> take<S>4868</S> account<S>3056</S> of<S>3326</S> his<S>846</S> servants<S>1401</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when he<S>846</S> had begun<S>756</S> to reckon<S>4868</S>, one<S>1520</S> was brought<S>4374</S> unto him<S>846</S>, which owed<S>3781</S> him<S>846</S> ten thousand<S>3463</S> talents<S>5007</S>. <sup>talents: a talent is 750.ounces of silver, which after five shillings the ounce is 187.li. 10.s.</sup>
But forasmuch as<S>1161</S> he<S>846</S> had<S>2192</S> not<S>3361</S> to pay<S>591</S>, his<S>846</S> lord<S>2962</S> commanded<S>2753</S> him<S>846</S> to be sold<S>4097</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S>, and<S>2532</S> children<S>5043</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> that<S>3745</S> he had<S>2192</S>, and<S>2532</S> payment to be made<S>591</S>.
The servant<S>1401</S> therefore<S>3767</S> fell down<S>4098</S>, and worshipped<S>4352</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, have patience<S>3114</S> with<S>1909</S> me<S>1698</S>, and<S>2532</S> I will pay<S>591</S> thee<S>4671</S> all<S>3956</S>. <sup>worshipped him: or, besought him</sup>
Then<S>1161</S> the lord<S>2962</S> of that<S>1565</S> servant<S>1401</S> was moved with compassion<S>4697</S>, and loosed<S>630</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> forgave<S>863</S> him<S>846</S> the debt<S>1156</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the same<S>1565</S> servant<S>1401</S> went out<S>1831</S>, and found<S>2147</S> one<S>1520</S> of his<S>846</S> fellowservants<S>4889</S>, which<S>3739</S> owed<S>3784</S> him<S>846</S> an hundred<S>1540</S> pence<S>1220</S>: and<S>2532</S> he laid hands<S>2902</S> on him<S>846</S>, and took him by the throat<S>4155</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Pay<S>591</S> me<S>3427</S> that<S>3748</S> thou owest<S>3784</S>. <sup>pence: the Roman penny is the eighth part of an ounce, which after five shillings the ounce is seven pence halfpenny; about fourteen cents</sup>
And<S>3767</S> his<S>846</S> fellowservant<S>4889</S> fell down<S>4098</S> at<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> feet<S>4228</S>, and besought<S>3870</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Have patience<S>3114</S> with<S>1909</S> me<S>1698</S>, and<S>2532</S> I will pay<S>591</S> thee<S>4671</S> all<S>3956</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he would<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S>: but<S>235</S> went<S>565</S> and cast<S>906</S> him<S>846</S> into<S>1519</S> prison<S>5438</S>, till<S>2193</S> <S>3739</S> he should pay<S>591</S> the debt<S>3784</S>.
So<S>1161</S> when his<S>846</S> fellowservants<S>4889</S> saw<S>1492</S> what was done<S>1096</S>, they were very<S>4970</S> sorry<S>3076</S>, and<S>2532</S> came<S>2064</S> and told<S>1285</S> unto their<S>846</S> lord<S>2962</S> all<S>3956</S> that was done<S>1096</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> his<S>846</S> lord<S>2962</S>, after that he had called<S>4341</S> him<S>846</S>, said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, O thou wicked<S>4190</S> servant<S>1401</S>, I forgave<S>863</S> thee<S>4671</S> all<S>3956</S> that<S>1565</S> debt<S>3782</S>, because<S>1893</S> thou desiredst<S>3870</S> me<S>3165</S>:
Shouldest<S>1163</S> not<S>3756</S> thou<S>4571</S> also<S>2532</S> have had compassion<S>1653</S> on thy<S>4675</S> fellowservant<S>4889</S>, even<S>2532</S> as<S>5613</S> I<S>1473</S> had pity<S>1653</S> on thee<S>4571</S>?
And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> lord<S>2962</S> was wroth<S>3710</S>, and delivered<S>3860</S> him<S>846</S> to the tormentors<S>930</S>, till<S>2193</S> <S>3739</S> he should pay<S>591</S> all<S>3956</S> that was due<S>3784</S> unto him<S>846</S>.
So<S>3779</S> likewise shall my<S>3450</S> heavenly<S>2032</S> Father<S>3962</S> do<S>4160</S> also<S>2532</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, if<S>3362</S> ye from<S>575</S> your<S>5216</S> hearts<S>2588</S> forgive<S>863</S> not<S>3362</S> every one<S>1538</S> his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S> their<S>846</S> trespasses<S>3900</S>.
